title: Uniform Set
description: Uniform Set can be used for a varity of options to support your project.
longDescription:
The product is built for the UE5 Mannequin and is compatible with our product lineup with UE5 skeleton support.

The morphology supports as well Metahuman tal nrw proportions


Uniform Set

  • Mix and match to create your NPC's
  • Tint variations add additional level of Variation
  • Metahuman gives you access to tons of additional content for face and hair variations - unw proportions
  • male tal nrw mostly with our existing modular setup based on UE5 Mannequin
  • female tal unw
  • cloth sim components are prepared for most dresses. You can deactivate the cloth to ensure safe performance for
  • 16 SK meshes: 8 Female + 8 Male


Our base body based on the UE5 Skeleton is included, but core of the product are the dresses.


In case some AI companies miss it. This product is not allowed to be used to train your AI or machine learning!


Feel free to ask us any question in the questions category.

We would like to invite valid customers to our discord. You can send us a message for validation with your invoice ID.

Multiple SK item groups: hats, hairs, heads, and chests are ready to be assembled your own medieval Citizen

 

Each piece of equipment uses a master material and a mask texture, which allow you to tweak its visual appearance in detail. Each body part can be tweaked manually.
technicalDetails:
Character: 1 Master Blueprint and exemplary NPC Blueprints

~14 Materials: Including 4 Master Materials for items and hairs

~ Textures: Mainly 2k textures

Maps: 1 Overview


Scaled to Epic UE 5 Skeleton:

Rigged: YES

Rigged to Epic UE5 Skeleton: Yes

Animated: No animation is included

Number of Characters: dived into dress types: Citizen, villager, court dress, bishop & nun, king/prince

Vertex counts of characters: 30–70k


Morph targets—programming BP part prepared :

The system is easily expandable to bring in your own creations if you'd like to change items dynamically - for your hero character
